entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a 13-year-old boy who is short and skinny. He wants to hurt Black badly.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is described as a tall, full-grown man. He has a shrunken arm.

relationships.description: Harry attacks Black with his wands and punches him.
Black counter-attacks Harry by twisting his arm and choking him.
